system.description:
You can release a splash of digestive enzymes to harm your foes. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.z3y2a7pwy9gzcv45]{Acid Splash} cantrip, which you can cast without requiring components. Your spellcasting ability for this cantrip is your choice of Charisma, Constitution, Intelligence, or Wisdom.

You can also use your digestive enzymes to dig. You have a burrowing speed of 10 feet and can move through nonmagical earth and stone, but not solid rock. You don’t leave a tunnel behind unless you spend time and effort to shore up the tunnel, reducing your burrow speed to 5 feet every 15 minutes.
